yeast.title: Yeast Types
yeast.content:
Yeast is a leavening agent.
  • Instant yeast: Fast-acting, can be mixed directly into flour.
  • Active dry yeast: Needs to be dissolved in water first.
  • Sourdough starter: Natural yeast culture, gives tangy flavor.

sourdough starter.title: Sourdough Starter
sourdough starter.content: A sourdough starter is a mixture of flour and water colonized by wild yeast and bacteria, used for natural leavening.
